verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: arrived] [ARG4: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARGM-TMP: before Tuesday 's highly anticipated summit meeting with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un] .
President Donald Trump arrived in Singapore on Sunday before Tuesday 's [ARGM-EXT: highly] [V: anticipated] [ARG1: summit meeting] with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un .
